intro.text: Whether you want to discover the perfumer's craft, create your own candle, or live a unique sensory experience around wine, we have the workshop for you. All our workshops take place in our dedicated space on the first floor of the boutique.

location.title: Location
location.partner: Dinner workshops at Mel'a Table (across the street)

booking.title: Booking
booking.text: Workshops are by reservation. Contact us by phone, email or via the form to book your spot.

group.title: Groups & Private hire
group.text: All our workshops can be privatized for your events: birthdays, hen parties, team building...

cta.title: Ready to live the experience?

hero.title: Create your own perfume
hero.subtitle: Want to treat yourself and create a unique perfume that reflects you? Your dream will come true when you walk through our doors.

product.title: The product
product.description: We offer you the possibility to create your own perfume or home fragrance. You will have exclusivity on the formula, it will only be produced at your request.

step1.title: Make an appointment
step1.description: Fill out the contact form to make an appointment with the perfumer and schedule the first creation session.

step2.title: First appointment
step2.description: You will discuss what you like, the scents that appeal to you, and establish the criteria that the perfumer will use to create some perfumes.

step3.title: Evaluation and adjustments
step3.description: During your second appointment, you will evaluate together the different creations to define those you like and continue the work. These steps will be repeated until your complete satisfaction.

registration.title: Registration fees
registration.description: Each perfume must meet European Community conditions and be registered (~€1,200 for a home fragrance, ~€1,500 for a perfume - no margin on our part)

samples.title: Sample creation
samples.description: Several prototypes created according to your criteria

stability.title: Stability tests
stability.description: Verification of durability and quality over time

sessions.title: Sessions with the perfumer
sessions.description: Different modules available depending on the chosen package

bottles.title: Bottles of your creation
bottles.description: 1 or 2 bottles included depending on the package

forfaits.title: Our packages
forfaits.subtitle: Choose the formula suited to your project

parfum.title: Perfumes
parfum.description: Create your unique eau de parfum

note.title: Good to know
note.text: Prices are indicative and may be adjusted according to consultation hours, quantity of finished product ordered, possible technical tests to be carried out or the type of raw materials used and registration fees. Don't hesitate to ask us for a personalized quote if you don't find what you're looking for in the proposed formulas.

meta.description: Discover the story of NeZ ZeN, a Belgian artisanal perfumery founded by Romain and Aurélie in Namur.

hero.title: A perfumery that highlights ingredients
hero.subtitle: NeZ ZeN is above all a story of passion, creativity and Belgian artisanal craftsmanship.

intro.title: The NeZ and the ZeN
intro.paragraph1: NeZ ZeN, a Belgian artisanal perfumery led by the NeZ Romain Pantoustier and the ZeN Aurélie Gillon who decided to live their dream by creating a boutique dedicated to olfactory pleasures.
intro.paragraph2: By passing through our doors you will find, in a relaxed atmosphere, a range of unique perfumes as well as home fragrances, cosmetics...
intro.paragraph3: Don't hesitate to come and chat with our perfumer and discover how our elixirs are prepared and what makes them different.

principles.title: Our four creation principles
principles.subtitle: What guides each of our creations

jus.title: The "Juice" at the center
jus.description: Character creations. The perfume is at the heart of our product, with high concentrations and quality raw materials.

experience.title: A unique experience
experience.description: Discover our materials and follow our team's advice to find the perfume that suits you.

transparence.title: Transparency
transparence.description: In our manufacturing process and the quality of our ingredients. Come see how our elixirs are prepared.

innovation.title: An innovative approach
innovation.description: To creation that highlights the beauty of the product and its user. Perfumes off the beaten track.

principles.note: Even if our collections evolve over time and the inspiration of our perfumer, you will always be able to order your favorite perfume even if it is no longer available in store.

chef.title: When a perfumer meets a chef
chef.description: We had the pleasure of collaborating with several chefs to create perfumed dishes. Notably with the D'Arville restaurant and Arabelle Meirlaen who created a dessert based on our Terre de Feu perfume.

vin.title: When a perfumer helps you (re)discover wine
vin.description: In collaboration with Alsace wines, we had the opportunity to participate in a masterclass around Gewurztraminer. We broke down two vintages from Engel and Hugel houses into primary aromas. A beautiful moment of sharing that allows you to discover wine differently.

the.title: Perfumer and tea sommelier
the.description: A special meeting with the Palais des Thés Namur team. The two teams of enthusiasts worked around perfumed teas to help you rediscover these fragrant creations.

partage.title: NeZ ZeN and sharing
partage.description: One of our values is sharing, so whenever we have the opportunity we share our passion, in our workshop daily but also during specific events.

hero.subtitle: Individuals, businesses, artisans... Discover their experiences with NeZ ZeN.

mike-meys.name: Mike Meys Creation Studio
mike-meys.description: Belgian creator Mike Meys trusted us to develop his olfactory signature. After a collaboration of nearly 9 months, Hard'heure was born, a perfume inspired by the descent into hell of Dante's Divine Comedy.
mike-meys.result: Created perfume: Hard'heure - An intense perfume that begins with seduction in great aromatic freshness to end towards a mystical serenity.

chris-alexxa.name: Chris Alexxa Jewels
chris-alexxa.description: The meeting of two passionate artisans. We had the pleasure of creating the olfactory ambiance for Chris Alexxa Jewels, a jeweler from Liège.
chris-alexxa.result: Olfactory signature: An original, timeless and sensual composition reflecting the organic universe of the brand.

ores.name: Orès
ores.description: A desire to create a custom team building to help teams initiate change. We created a bespoke event including a cocktail creation workshop, a perfumed meal, an overview of the evolution of perfumery.
ores.result: Custom event: Cocktail workshop + perfumed meal + perfumery discovery in a relaxed atmosphere.

villa-servais.name: Villa Servais
villa-servais.description: Creation of a custom olfactory ambiance for this charming guest house.
villa-servais.result: Personalized home fragrance to create a unique and memorable atmosphere.
